title: How to Draw Mufasa

steps.headline: Start with a circle for the head and the line of action.
steps.description: Draw two guidelines (one vertical and one horizontal) to indicate his facial features.

steps.headline: Draw two ovals (one big and one small) for his body.
Connect the two ovals with wavy lines.

text: Start with a circle for the head and the line of action. Draw two guidelines (one vertical and one horizontal) to indicate his facial features. Draw two ovals (one big and one small) for his body.  Connect the two ovals with wavy lines.  Draw his two front legs.  Draw his two back legs.  Draw his mane outline.  Add some detail.  Color the drawing.
sentences: Start with a circle for the head and the line of action.
Draw two guidelines (one vertical and one horizontal) to indicate his facial features.
Draw two ovals (one big and one small) for his body.
Connect the two ovals with wavy lines.
